code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{createDeck}from"../utils/api/index.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewDeck(){const history=useHistory();const initialFormData={name:"",description:""};const[formData,setFormData]=useState(initialFormData);const changeHandler=_ref=>{let{target}=_ref;setFormData({...formData,[target.name]:target.value});};const submitHandler=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const data=await createDeck(formData);setFormData(initialFormData);history.push("/decks/".concat(data.id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{"aria-label":"breadcrumb",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ol",{className:"breadcrumb",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"breadcrumb-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"breadcrumb-item active","aria-current":"page",children:"Create Deck"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Create Deck"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:submitHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",id:"name",placeholder:"Deck Name",required:true,onChange:changeHandler}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{type:"text",name:"description",id:"description",placeholder:"Add a Deck Description",required:true,onChange:changeHandler}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:()=>history.push("/"),children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"reset",className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>setFormData(initialFormData),children:"Reset Form"})]})]});}export default NewDeck;
